DataElement.preferredName: Acute Graft Versus Host Disease Lower Gastrointestinal Tract Involvement Maximum Severity Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A description of the maximum severity of acute graft versus host disease lower intestinal tract involvement.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Acute Graft Versus Host Disease Lower Gastrointestinal Tract Involvement Maximum Severity
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A syndrome of immologically mediated tissue damage occurring following allogeneic transplant usually affecting the skin, liver, and gi tract.  Onset is usually within one hundred days of transplantation or immunologic manipulation._The lower part of the gastrointestinal tract that includes the jejunum and ileum of the small intestine and the large intestine._To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process._The largest possible quantity or degree._Used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather; also, strictness.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A syndrome of immologically mediated tissue damage occurring following allogeneic transplant usually affecting the skin, liver, and gi tract.  Onset is usually within one hundred days of transplantation or immunologic manipulation.:No Value Exists:To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

Concepts.definition: A syndrome of immunologically mediated tissue damage that may occur following an allogeneic transplant, usually affecting the skin, liver, and GI tract. The onset is usually within one hundred days of transplantation or immunologic manipulation.
The lower part of the gastrointestinal tract that includes the jejunum and ileum of the small intestine and the large intestine.
To have a connection by participation or association or use; sharing in an activity or process.

Property.preferredDefinition: the largest possible quantity or degree.:Severity; used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather.

Concepts.definition: The largest possible quantity or degree.
Used of the degree of something undesirable e.g. pain or weather; also, strictness.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No diarrhea, no diarrhea attributable to acute GVHD / diarrhea < 500 mL/day (adult), or < 10 mL/kg/day (pediatric)
Severe abdominal pain, with or without ileus, and/or grossly bloody stool
